I need to run more!.title: I really need to run more!
I need to run more!.description: I want to be able to run a mile in under 6 minutes. In order to do this, I need to run more often to increase my lung capacity and I need to stretch more to take care of my muscles.

CrossFit is cool!.title: CrossFit is cool
CrossFit is cool!.description: CrossFit is cool, but you don't need to do CrossFit, just do functional excersise. Bodyweight movements and Olympic weightlifting.

I want to do a triathon!.title: Traning for a triathon
I want to do a triathon!.description: I've always wanted to do a triathon. I need to start running more, biking more, and swimming in order to be prepared.
